action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y upgrade

sudo yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion
sudo yum -y remove firewalld

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname @@{MASTER_HOSTNAME}@@

sudo yum -y install epel-release

# sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

#!/bin/sh

sudo yum -y install https://repo.saltstack.com/yum/redhat/salt-repo-latest-2.el7.noarch.rpm
sudo yum -y install salt-master

# make sure the salt binaries were installed correctly
# installation failure won't cause the script to stop unless we manually exit with an error code here
[ -e /usr/bin/salt ] && echo "salt binary found" || exit $?

sleep 3

sudo systemctl enable salt-master.service
sudo systemctl start salt-master.service

# bind to and listen on the host IP address only
sudo sed -i -- 's/#interface: 0.0.0.0/interface: @@{address}@@/' /etc/salt/master

sudo echo '@@{address}@@ salt' | sudo tee -a /etc/hosts

sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt
sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/all
sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/dbserver
sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/webserver
sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/haproxyserver

sudo echo "global
  log 127.0.0.1 local0
  log 127.0.0.1 local1 notice
  maxconn 4096
  quiet
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
defaults
  log     global
  mode    http
  retries 3
  timeout client 50s
  timeout connect 5s
  timeout server 50s
  option dontlognull
  option httplog
  option redispatch
  balance  roundrobin
# Set up application listeners here.
listen stats 0.0.0.0:8080
  mode http
  log global
  stats enable
  stats hide-version
  stats refresh 30s
  stats show-node
  stats uri /stats
frontend http
  maxconn 2000
  bind 0.0.0.0:80
  default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | sudo tee /srv/salt/haproxyserver/haproxy.cfg

sudo echo "server {
    listen   80 default_server;
    server_name  _;

    root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
    index index.php index.html index.htm;

    location / {
        try_files \$uri \$uri/ =404;
    }
    error_page 404 /404.html;
    error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;
    location = /50x.html {
        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
    }

    location ~ \.php\$ {
        try_files \$uri =404;
        fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php-fpm/php-fpm.sock;
        fastcgi_index index.php;
        fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME \$document_root\$fastcgi_script_name;
        include fastcgi_params;
    }
}" | sudo tee /srv/salt/webserver/default.conf

sudo echo "user nginx;
worker_processes auto;
error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log;
pid /run/nginx.pid;

# Load dynamic modules. See /usr/share/nginx/README.dynamic.
include /usr/share/nginx/modules/*.conf;

events {
    worker_connections 1024;
}

http {
    log_format  main  '\$remote_addr - \$remote_user [\$time_local] \"\$request\" '
                      '\$status \$body_bytes_sent \"\$http_referer\" '
                      '\"\$http_user_agent\" \"\$http_x_forwarded_for\"';

    access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;

    sendfile            on;
    tcp_nopush          on;
    tcp_nodelay         on;
    keepalive_timeout   65;
    types_hash_max_size 2048;

    include             /etc/nginx/mime.types;
    default_type        application/octet-stream;

    # Load modular configuration files from the /etc/nginx/conf.d directory.
    # See http://nginx.org/en/docs/ngx_core_module.html#include
    # for more information.
    include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;

}" | sudo tee /srv/salt/webserver/nginx.conf

sudo echo "<?php

phpinfo();" | sudo tee /srv/salt/webserver/index.php

sudo echo "base:
  '*':
    - all
  'dbminion*':
    - dbserver
  'webminion*':
    - webserver
  'haproxy*':
    - haproxyserver" | sudo tee /srv/salt/top.sls

sudo echo "pkg.upgrade:
  module.run
all.packages:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - git" | sudo tee /srv/salt/all/init.sls
      
sudo echo "database.packages:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - mariadb-server
  service.running:
    - name: mariadb
    - enable: True
app_database:
  mysql_database.present:
    - name: @@{DATABASE_NAME}@@
    - connection_host: 127.0.0.1
    - connection_user: root
add-user:
  mysql_user.present:
    - host: 127.0.0.1
    - name: @@{DATABASE_USER}@@
    - password: @@{DATABASE_PASSWORD}@@
    - connection_user: root
    - connection_charset: utf8
delete-existing-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"DELETE FROM mysql.user WHERE User='@@{DATABASE_USER}@@' AND Host NOT IN ('localhost', '127.0.0.1', '::1');\"
delete-blank-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"DELETE FROM mysql.user WHERE User='';\"
grant-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON @@{DATABASE_NAME}@@.* TO '@@{DATABASE_USER}@@'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '@@{DATABASE_PASSWORD}@@';\"
flush-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"FLUSH PRIVILEGES\"" | sudo tee /srv/salt/dbserver/init.sls
    
sudo echo "php7-setup:
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - sudo rpm -Uvh --replacepkgs http://rpms.remirepo.net/enterprise/remi-release-7.rpm
php7-packages:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - php-fpm
      - php-common
      - php-cli
      - php-pdo
      - php-mysqlnd
nginx:
  pkg.installed: []
  service.running:
    - enable: True
    - full_restart: True
    - watch:
      - file: /etc/nginx/*
    - require:
      - pkg: nginx
  file.managed:
    - name: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
    - source: salt://webserver/nginx.conf
    - require:
      - pkg: nginx
/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:
  file:
    - managed
    - source: salt://webserver/default.conf
/usr/share/nginx/html/index.php:
  file:
    - managed
    - source: salt://webserver/index.php
/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf:
  file:
    - managed
php-fpm:
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - sudo sed -i -- 's/user = apache/user = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sudo sed -i -- 's/group = apache/group = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sudo sed -i -- 's/;listen.owner = nobody/listen.owner = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sudo sed -i -- 's/;listen.group = nobody/listen.group = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sudo sed -i -- 's/listen = 127.0.0.1:9000/listen = \/var\/run\/php-fpm\/php-fpm.sock/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sudo sed -i -- 's/;cgi.fix_pathinfo=1/cgi.fix_pathinfo=0/' /etc/php.ini
  service.running:
    - name: php-fpm
    - enable: True
    - full_restart: True
    - watch:
      - file: /etc/php-fpm.d/*
disable-selinux:
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - sudo sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config" | sudo tee /srv/salt/webserver/init.sls
     
sudo echo "haproxy:
  pkg.installed: []
  service.running:
    - name: haproxy
    - enable: True
    - full_restart: True
    - watch:
      - file: /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
  file.managed:
    - name: /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
    - source: salt://haproxyserver/haproxy.cfg
    - require:
      - pkg: haproxy" | sudo tee /srv/salt/haproxyserver/init.sls

# systemctl restart salt-master

#!/bin/sh

sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y upgrade

sudo yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano
sudo yum -y install epel-release
sudo yum -y remove firewalld

# MySQL-python is required for SaltStack MySQL modules
sudo yum -y install MySQL-python

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname @@{name}@@

sudo yum -y install epel-release

#sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

hosts=$(echo "@@{WebMinion.address}@@" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
port=80

for host in $hosts
do
   sudo echo "  server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /srv/salt/haproxyserver/haproxy.cfg
done

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

# restart the salt-master service in case changes have been made to Salt states
# systemctl restart salt-master

# give the salt-master service time to restart and calm down a bit
# sleep 5

# show some info about the minions with approved keys
sudo salt-key -L
sudo salt '*' test.ping

# apply states to all Salt minions
sudo salt '*' state.apply

#!/bin/sh

# setup new SaltStack directory structure
sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/laravel-nginx; sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/laravel; sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/composer; sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/epel; sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/remi; sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/php71; sudo mkdir -p /srv/salt/composer

# setup the state file for the epel-release repos
echo "01-prepare:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - epel-release" | sudo tee /srv/salt/epel/init.sls
      
# setup the state file for the remi repo
echo "# Completely ignore non-CentOS, non-RHEL systems
{% if grains['os_family'] == 'RedHat' %}

# A lookup table for remi GPG keys & RPM URLs for various RedHat releases
{% set pkg = salt['grains.filter_by']({
  '5': {
    'key': 'http://rpms.famillecollet.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-remi',
    'key_hash': 'md5=3abb4e5a7b1408c888e19f718c012630',
    'rpm': 'http://mirrors.mediatemple.net/remi/enterprise/remi-release-5.rpm',
  },
  '6': {
    'key': 'http://rpms.famillecollet.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-remi',
    'key_hash': 'md5=3abb4e5a7b1408c888e19f718c012630',
    'rpm': 'http://mirrors.mediatemple.net/remi/enterprise/remi-release-6.rpm',
  },
  '7': {
    'key': 'http://rpms.famillecollet.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-remi',
    'key_hash': 'md5=3abb4e5a7b1408c888e19f718c012630',
    'rpm': 'http://mirrors.mediatemple.net/remi/enterprise/remi-release-7.rpm',
  },
}, 'osmajorrelease') %}


{% set remi_settings = salt['pillar.get']('remi') %}

install_remi_pubkey:
  file.managed:
    - name: /etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-remi
    - source: {{ remi_settings.pubkey|default(pkg.key) }}
    - source_hash:  {{ remi_settings.pubkey_hash|default(pkg.key_hash) }}

include:
    - epel

install_remi_rpm:
  pkg.installed:
    - sources:
      - remi-release: {{ remi_settings.rpm|default(pkg.rpm) }}
    - requires:
      - file: install_remi_pubkey
      - pkg: epel

{% if remi_settings.disabled|default(False) %}
disable_remi:
  file.replace:
    - name: /etc/yum.repos.d/remi.repo
    - pattern: '^enabled=\d'
    - repl: enabled=0
{% else %}
enable_remi:
  file.replace:
    - name: /etc/yum.repos.d/remi.repo
    - pattern: '^enabled=\d'
    - repl: enabled=1
{% endif %}

{% if 'repo' in remi_settings %}
{% for repo,opts in remi_settings.repo.iteritems() %}
{% if opts.disabled|default(False) %}
disable_{{ repo }}:
  file.replace:
    - name: /etc/yum.repos.d/{{ repo }}.repo
    - pattern: '^enabled=\d'
    - repl: enabled=0
{% else %}
enable_{{ repo }}:
  file.replace:
    - name: /etc/yum.repos.d/{{ repo }}.repo
    - pattern: '^enabled=\d'
    - repl: enabled=1
{% endif %}
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

{% endif %}" | sudo tee /srv/salt/remi/init.sls

# setup the state file for install PHP 7.1
echo "include:
  - remi

enable-repo:
  cmd.run:
    - name: yum-config-manager --enable remi-php71

install:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - php-common
      - php-fpm
      - php-cli
      - php-mbstring
      - php-xml
      - php-pdo
      - php-json
  require:
    - pkg: enable-repo" | sudo tee /srv/salt/php71/init.sls

# setup the state file for the composer install
sudo echo "include:
  - php71
  
{% set temp_dir = '/root' %}

01-set-environment:
  environ.setenv:
    - name: HOME
    - value: /root
    - update_minion: True
02-download-installer:
  file.managed:
    - name: {{ temp_dir }}/installer
    - source: https://getcomposer.org/installer
    - skip_verify: True
  require:
    - pkg: 01-setup-environment
03-run-installer:
  cmd.run:
    - cwd: {{ temp_dir }}
    - name: /usr/bin/php {{ temp_dir }}/installer
  require:
    - pkg: 02-download-installer
04-move-composer-to-destination:
  file.managed:
    - name: /usr/local/bin/composer
    - source: {{ temp_dir }}/composer.phar
    - mode: 755
    - user: root
    - group: root
  require:
    - pkg: 03-run-installer" | sudo tee /srv/salt/composer/init.sls
        
echo "<?php

namespace App\Providers;

use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;
use Schema;

class AppServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
{
    /**
     * Bootstrap any application services.
     *
     * @return void
     */
    public function boot()
    {
        Schema::defaultStringLength(191);
    }

    /**
     * Register any application services.
     *
     * @return void
     */
    public function register()
    {
        //
    }
}" | sudo tee /srv/salt/laravel/AppServiceProvider.php
     
# setup the state file for the Laravel install
echo "include:
  - composer

{% set version = 'c09537b057bd8553b6fab790ad16b6fca0648b33' %}
{% set temp_dir = '/root/laravel-extracted' %}
{% set destination = '/usr/share/nginx/html' %}
{% set temp_zip = '/root/laravel.zip' %}

{% if grains['os'] == 'CentOS*' %}
01-prepare:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - policycoreutils-python
      - policycoreutils
  selinux_mode:
    selinux.mode:
      - name: permissive
      - require:
        - pkg: policycoreutils
        - pkg: policycoreutils-python
{% endif %}
02-download-source:
  file.managed:
    - name: {{ temp_zip }}
    - source: https://github.com/laravel/laravel/archive/{{ version }}.zip
    - skip_verify: True
{% if grains['os'] == 'CentOS*' %}
  require:
    - pkg: 01-prepare
{% endif %}
03-remove-existing:
  file.directory:
    - name: {{ temp_dir }}
    - clean: True
  require:
    - pkg: 02-download-source
04-extract-source:
  archive.extracted:
    - name: {{ temp_dir }}
    - source: {{ temp_zip }}
  require:
    - pkg: 03-remove-existing
05-setup-site:
  environ.setenv:
    - name: HOME
    - value: /root
    - update_minion: True
  cmd.run:
    - cwd: {{ temp_dir }}/laravel-{{ version }}
    - name: composer install
  require:
    - pkg: 04-extract-source
06-setup-env:
  file.managed:
    - name: {{ temp_dir }}/laravel-{{ version }}/.env
    - source: {{ temp_dir }}/laravel-{{ version }}/.env.example
    - mode: 755
  require:
    - pkg: 05-setup-site
07-generate-key:
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - php {{ temp_dir }}/laravel-{{ version }}/artisan key:generate
      - php {{ temp_dir }}/laravel-{{ version }}/artisan session:table
  require:
    - pkg: 06-setup-env
08-storage-permissions:
  file.directory:
    - name: {{ temp_dir}}/laravel-{{ version }}/storage
    - mode: 777
    - recurse:
      - mode
  require:
    - pkg: 07-generate-key
09-cache-permissions:
  file.directory:
    - name: {{ temp_dir }}/laravel-{{ version }}/bootstrap/cache
    - mode: 777
    - recurse:
      - mode
  require:
    - pkg: 08-storage-permissions
10-move-files-into-place:
  file.copy:
    - name: {{ destination }}
    - source: {{ temp_dir }}/laravel-{{ version }}
    - force: True
    - include_empty: True
  require:
    - pkg: 09-cache-permissions
11-clean-temporary-files:
  file.absent:
    - name: {{ temp_dir }}
  require:
    - pkg: 10-move-files-into-place
12-remove-temp-zip:
  file.absent:
    - name: {{ temp_zip }}
  require:
    - pkg: 11-clean-temporary-files" | sudo tee /srv/salt/laravel/init.sls
# setup the state file for the post-Laravel install Nginx configuration
sudo echo "include:                             
  - laravel
  
{% set destination = '/usr/share/nginx/html' %}  
  
{{ destination }}/app/Providers/AppServiceProvider.php:
  file.managed:
    - source: salt://laravel/AppServiceProvider.php
    - mode: 755
    - user: root
    - group: root
update-nginx-for-laravel:
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - sed -i -- 's/root.*\/usr\/share\/nginx\/html;/root \/usr\/share\/nginx\/html\/public;/' /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/DB_HOST=.*/DB_HOST=@@{DBMinion.address}@@/' /usr/share/nginx/html/.env
      - sed -i -- 's/DB_DATABASE=.*/DB_DATABASE=@@{DATABASE_NAME}@@/' /usr/share/nginx/html/.env
      - sed -i -- 's/DB_USERNAME=.*/DB_USERNAME=@@{DATABASE_USER}@@/' /usr/share/nginx/html/.env
      - sed -i -- 's/DB_PASSWORD=.*/DB_PASSWORD=@@{DATABASE_PASSWORD}@@/' /usr/share/nginx/html/.env" | sudo tee /srv/salt/laravel-nginx/init.sls
      
sudo salt 'webminion*' state.apply laravel-nginx
sudo salt 'webminion*' system.reboot at_time=1
